## Setup
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      cache = TRUE)

pacman::p_load(tidyverse,
               here,
               readxl)

theme_set(ggthemes::theme_fivethirtyeight())
```

## Import data
```{r}
close <- 
  read_excel(here("data", "close_c3.xlsx"))

mouth <- 
  read_excel(here("data", "mouth_c3.xlsx"))

reach <- 
  read_excel(here("data", "reach_c3.xlsx"))
```
